translations: 用（禽类的）内脏杂碎做的

sentences.sentence: "So, " said he, with his hopes d love sadly fading away, "Yon had no other aim in marrying me than to save me from the giblet? "
sentences.translation: “原来如此，”随着爱情幢憬的破灭，他凄然说道，“你和我结婚仅仅是为了把我从绞刑架上救下来，毫无别的意思吗？”

sentences.sentence: Among the dishes served up to him, the landlord especially recommended a certain giblet of "native rabbit," on which he prided himself.
sentences.translation: 饭店老板在所有的菜中特别向他推荐了当地特产炒兔子肉，说这个菜的味道最美。
